title: ARABIC/ENGLISH
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including Arabic and English Language, Mathematics, Literature in English, any other subject.
subjects: Arabic and two (2) subjects from Arts/Social Science

title: BUSINESS EDUCATION
utme_requirements:
SSC credit passes or TC II merits in English Language and any three (3) of:

1. Economics

2. Accounts

3. Government

4. Geography

5. History

6. Business Method

7. Statistics

8. Commerce

9. Any Science subjects

 

NB: GROUP A:

Commercial Arithmetic Costing, Principles of Accounts, Book Keeping Mathematics, Statistics.

 

GROUP B:

Office Practice, Business Method, Commerce, Economics.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics and any of Geography, Commerce and Principles of Accounts.

title: CHRISTIAN RELIGIOUS STUDIES/ENGLISH
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Christian Religious Studies, Literature in English and any other Arts subject.
subjects: Christian Religious Studies, Literature in English Language and Arts subject.

title: EARLY CHILDHOOD CARE EDUCATION (DOUBLE MAJOR)
subjects: English Language and any other three (3) subjects.

subjects: Economics, Geography and any other Social Science subject.

utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Literature in English, Yoruba and any Arts subject.

title: FINE & APPLIED ARTS (DOUBLE MAJOR)
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Fine Arts and any other two (2) subjects from:

1. Craft

2. Textile Clothing

3. Technical Drawing

4. A Science subject

5. An Arts subject

6. Decorative Painting

7. Spray Painting, Lining, Sign and Design

8. Wall Hanging, Colour Mixing/Matching and Glazing

9. Graphic Design

10. Graphic Printing

11. Ceramics

12. Basic Electricity.

13. General Wood work

14. General Metal Work

15. Men/Ladies Garment Construction & Finishing

16. Spinning 16. Weaving

17. Men/Ladies Textile Design

18.SurfaceDesign & Printing

19.  Bleaching, Dyeing and Finishing.

20. Spraying, Painting, Lining, Sign and Design
subjects: Fine Arts and any other two (2) subjects

title: HOME ECONOMICS (DOUBLE MAJOR)
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics and any three (3) of the followings:

1.  Agricultural Science

2.  Biology

3.  Chemistry

4.  General Science

5.  Health Science

6.  Home Management/

7.  Hotel and Catering

8.  Food and Nutrition

9.  Integrated Science

10. Physical and Health Education/Physical Education

11. Physics

12. Economics

13. General Metal Work

14. Building/Engineering Drawing

15. Men/Ladies Garment    

     Construction and Finishing

16. Men/Ladies Textile   Design

17. Spinning 

18. Weaving

19. Surface Design and

     Printing

20. Bleaching, Dyeing and

     Finishing

21. Basic Electricity

 

GROUP A:

Home Economics, Home Management, Cookery, Needle Work and Dress Making, Clothing and Textile, Food and Nutrition, Hotel Management and Catering.

 

GROUP B:

Biology, Chemistry, Physics, Integrated Science, Health Science, Agricultural Science, Mathematics/Arithmetic Process/Basic Mathematics, Economics, Physical and Health Education.
subjects: Any three (3) of Chemistry, Agricultural Science, Home Economics, Economics and Mathematics.

title: ISLAMIC STUDIES/SOCIAL STUDIES
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Islamic Studies and any two (2) of

1. Economics

2. Government/History

3. Geography
subjects: Islamic Studies, Government/History and any one (1)  Social/Arts Subject.

title: MATHEMATICS/COMPUTER EDUCATION
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics and any two (2) Science subjects.
subjects: Mathematics and any other two (2) Science subjects.

title: PHYSICAL & HEALTH EDUCATION (DOUBLE MAJOR)
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credits/TC II merit passes in Five (5) subjects including English Language, Biology or its equivalent.

title: POLITICAL SCIENCE/ECONOMICS
utme_requirements: Five (5)SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any other Social Science subjects.
subjects: Economics, Government/History and any other Social Science subject.

title: PRIMARY EDUCATION STUDIES (DOUBLE MAJOR)
subjects: English Language and any other three (3) subjects.

title: SOCIAL STUDIES (DOUBLE MAJOR)
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Government/History and two (2) Social Science subjects.
subjects: Government/History and two (2) of Social Science subjects.

title: SOCIAL STUDIES/CHRISTIAN RELIGIOUS STUDIES
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Christian Religious Studies and any other two (2) of Economics/Commerce, Government/History, Government/Social Studies.
subjects: Christian Religious Studies and any other of History/Government, Geography, Social Studies, Economics/Commerce.
